message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, as you know it's worth $15,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest but $11,500 is simply too low.  Let's split the difference. I'm willing to come down to $13,250. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,250 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,750 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
